definitions.title: Qal.
definitions.body: Pf. [[אַזַל]] 1Sa 9:7; 3 fs. [[אָֽזְלַת]] (poet.) De 32:36; [[אָֽזְלוּ]] Job 14:11; Impf. 2 fs. [[תֵּזְלִי]] (for [[תֵּאזְלִי]]) Je 2:36; Pt. [[אׂזֵל]] Pr 20:14—go away Pr 20:14; go about Je 2:36 [[מַה־תֵּזְלִי מְאׂד לְשַׁנּוֹת]] [[אֶת־דַּרְכֵָּךְ]]; be gone, exhausted, used up De 32:36 (subj. [[יׇד]] strength); sq. [[מִן]] 1Sa 9:7 [[הַלֶּחֶם אָזַל מִכֵּלֵינוּ]]; Job 14:11 [[אָֽזְלוּ מַיִם מִנִּי־יׇם]]

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְאוּזׇּל]] Ez Eze 27:19 (RV yarn, cf. Aram. [[עזל]] spin but) rd. [[מֵאוּזׇל]], v. sub [[אוּזׇל]] infr., so LXX SyrVer Hi Sm Co.
